abstract: Informs the workspace object that the file system changed at the specified path.
overview:
## Discussion

Avoid calling this method if possible. If you want to track changes to files and directories, use the FSEvents API described in `FSEvents`.

The [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSWorkspace] object uses this method to track changes to all the files and directories in which it is interested.

# noteFileSystemChanged(_:)

**Instance Method**

Informs the workspace object that the file system changed at the specified path.

## Declaration

```swift
func noteFileSystemChanged(_ path: String)
```

## Parameters

- **path**: The full path that changed.

## Discussion

Avoid calling this method if possible. If you want to track changes to files and directories, use the FSEvents API described in `FSEvents`.

The [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSWorkspace] object uses this method to track changes to all the files and directories in which it is interested.
title: noteFileSystemChanged(_:)
